website_summaries.verdict: A more feminine look for young fashionistas who reject Teva's more typical styles.
pros: Open toe for quick water drainage
Comes in silver-magenta (Zappos and Amazon), light blue, purple, pink and black (Amazon)
cons: Ankle straps are hard to cinch small enough for children with very thin legs

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter for our upcoming trip to Disneyworld. She has been wearing them everyday for the past week and loves them. All the straps are adjustable except for the one that goes around the heel. That one is a little big, but overall it's a good fit and she says they're very comfortable. She also says they're very cute, which is important when you're nine.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: Size Down!
customer_reviews.text: The photos of the blue shoe doesn't do the shoe any justice; its a very beautiful blue in person. However I have to return the shoe because the sizing runs extremely big, I think about 2 whole sizes too big. I ordered a size 3 for my daughter who wears a 2.5 shoe and the shoe instead could fit me a 30 yr old woman who wears a size 5-6 shoe. Might reordered the shoe because we love Tevas and the color is just so gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Fit is much larger than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely but HUGE. Bought a size 6 for my size 5 daughter, figuring we could adjust the straps if a bit large. You know how fast children grow! Well, I'm a size 7 and they were too big for me. Not only a bit long but I tightened the ankle strap as tight as I could and it was still too big and gaping on my adult ankle. I don't deny they're pretty and seem solid but they are definitely not "true to size".
customer_reviews.author: KBW

customer_reviews.title: The best sandle
customer_reviews.text: I've bought these for my daughter four years straight they are just that good. My daughter has a wide foot and she needs a sturdy Sandler or she'll trip or wobble. These are true to size and great!
customer_reviews.author: Jmom

customer_reviews.title: We have a Winner!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is so picky about her shoes it drives me nuts. So every summer I bend over backward to find a sandal she will WEAR and better if they can be worn in the rivers and beaches for safety. Good thing I spend the extra couple bucks because we were finding glass everywhere on a kayak trip. She kept telling me I need a pair myself. I think I may :0
customer_reviews.author: JaneneBean

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. I bought 2 pair for my girls. One pair frayed on the first wear, lots of strings came off the edge of the straps. Thought it may have been a bum pair, but the 2nd pair frayed by the 4th wear. By the time the girls get home from school, long strings (3-4 inches in length) are hanging off all of the straps. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: ... this summer and she found them to be very comfortable. No sore feet even after hours of park ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wore these sandals on a Disney vacation this summer and she found them to be very comfortable. No sore feet even after hours of park walking.
customer_reviews.author: C. Del Valle

customer_reviews.title: Love they come in bigger sizes as well
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these same exact sandals for my 10 year old daughter since she was 4 years old. Love they come in bigger sizes as well. These are easy for her to get on and are very comfortable for all those summer activities which involve a lot of walking. I will continue to buy them until she is a teen and tells me they aren't cool anymore lol.
customer_reviews.author: kai0717

customer_reviews.title: This is a great sandal for kids that play hard
customer_reviews.text: Only sandal I buy for my kids. It’s totally worth spending a couple extra bucks and getting something that will last the summer. So many stores sell subpar sandals that you have to replace multi times a year. This is a great sandal for kids that play hard.
customer_reviews.author: Christine McKinnon

customer_reviews.title: Not Great
customer_reviews.text: I like these because they are cheaper than most other Teva Sandals. I wear a size 7 1/2 in Womens', but by girls 5 1/2 for a money saver. I expected them to be a tad small, but the terrible arch support really baffled me. I still like the shoe and the color but my all day wear shoe can only be worn a few hours. :(
customer_reviews.author: Jackson & Destiny Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these sandals!
customer_reviews.text: Great sandals! Very comfortable according to my daughter. She likes how there is padding under the straps and closures, which has been a deal breaker in the past with other sandals, including Teva. Very cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Ava S.

customer_reviews.title: Bottom was punctured and then, so was my foot.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not the Teva quality I've come to expect. I have never gotten blisters until this pair. I was also injured while wearing them, the bottom of the show was punctured, which isn't supposed to happen with all terrain sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Nevermore

customer_reviews.title: Like the shoes so much...  But now the price too high...
customer_reviews.text: Like the shoes so much... But now the price too high...
customer_reviews.author: Lee Kok Heong

customer_reviews.title: Happy to find that this shoe is svdilsble for children
customer_reviews.text: Happy to find that this shoe is svdilsble for children. 8 year old Granddaughter loves these sandals, especially the nice purple color. Her mom and I have both worn the Tirra sandal for several seasons and are jealous that we can't get purple. The shoe provides good support and stability.
customer_reviews.author: Jenoren

customer_reviews.title: Amazing as usual
customer_reviews.text: Both my kids grew up in Tevas from the smallest size. They look amazing after a year of daily use on a playgrounds, beach, pool, and SoCal sun. Don't slip even on splash pads, foot doesn't slide around, dry fast, and never a single blister.
customer_reviews.author: HJD

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes, and my daughter loves to run in ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoes, and my daughter loves to run in them. The only complaint is that the fabric on the shoes already starts to fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. They are easily adjusted to fit your child's foot.
customer_reviews.author: Marchangel

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals! My daughter loved them but seemed big
customer_reviews.text: Great sandals! My daughter loved them but seemed big. She is a 1 1/2 so I got her a 2 but they were giant so I am returning them for a 1. Great quality and super comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Wendlandt

customer_reviews.title: My favorite summer sandal
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered these sandals three years in a row for my now 5 year old. They are cute, easy to put on, have good arch support, stay on the feet well, have an excellent sole and offer good traction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable straight out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I wear women's size 4 shoes so I often have to resort to the kid's section when looking for footwear. It's hard to find shoes that look "grown up" in my size (I'm 52 years old btw). I'm so glad I found these sandals in plain black and no glitter/neon/lights were involved! Thanks Amazon and Teva! The only thing better is if Teva made more colors in my size that mimics the women's colors. Hint hint.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Check the size carefully
customer_reviews.text: I am having to return this product from NZ and am hoping the exchange is hassle free. This was purchased for my daughter who's previous hand me down pair broke (worn last summer by her older sister). I selected the exact same size as these were a perfect fit. Unfortunately when this size arrived they are too small - her toes are right on the edge. Quite disappointed as these sandals are my go to for my girls in the summer as we are often at the beach and outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Queen

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Comfy Sandals
customer_reviews.text: These are great sandals! My daughter normally wears a wide width but these worked just fine as you can adjust the width to your comfort. They match with everything and are easy to run and play in too!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of two

customer_reviews.title: Quality, excellent shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Cannot say enough good things about these shoes. Have been buying them for years and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: fdlfan

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a sturdy sandal my daughter will wear. We have bought similar sandals (Keens) and finally have one that doesn't hurt her feet. It opens up entirely allowing for perfect customizing (and no rubbing).
customer_reviews.author: Christy M

customer_reviews.title: Cute sandals
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable and the color (aqua) is gorgeous. The soles are reasonably flexible, and it's easy to get a comfortable fit with all the straps. My daughter loves them.
customer_reviews.author: merryme

customer_reviews.title: Great summer shoe
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these sandals. The multiple adjustment points allow them to be custom fit to her foot for ultimate comfort.
customer_reviews.author: GambleOKC

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but runs large.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, but too large. Had to return. I think Teva runs a bit large
customer_reviews.author: K. Ames

customer_reviews.title: Retuned for smaller size. My fault, as I ...
customer_reviews.text: Retuned for smaller size . My fault, as I should have consulted the size chart which turned out to give the correct size once I consulted it !
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen T. Bdzil

customer_reviews.title: I went up one size and it is a perfect fit, not much room to spare
customer_reviews.text: I went up one size and it is a perfect fit, not much room to spare. Hopefully my daughters feet will not grow much and they will fit all summer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Custome

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these sandals
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these sandals..already have a pink pair, want another..one in every color would be fine!! They are superb, wear forever and fit me perfectly..I cannot rave about these sandals enough!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Cram

customer_reviews.title: comfortable but becomes smelly.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it and says it's the most comfortable sandal, giving it a four start b/c the inner sole needs to be scrubbed every few weeks or else it starts to smell.
customer_reviews.author: MrT

customer_reviews.title: Love Teva Sandals
customer_reviews.text: I buy my granddaughter Teva sandals every year around this time. I did buy them to large and will have to purchase a smaller size! She loves the color and comfort. She is very excited to get the smaller size!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice sandals, run big! Couldn't wear so cannot vouch for wearability. Will save for next year...
customer_reviews.author: RT Mom

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves these shoes she has been wearing her ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these shoes she has been wearing her 12s all summer, so I purchased the next size up for next year.
customer_reviews.author: S. Miczek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fantastic, my daughter loves her sandals! Great quality for playground, water parks etc
customer_reviews.author: Julia Puig Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful all-purpose dress sandals
customer_reviews.text: These are so pretty! My daughter loves them. But they are still Tevas and can go anywhere and do anything. Best of both worlds!
customer_reviews.author: Cow Hollow Gardener

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfy, durable!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and durable. Can be worn all day long. Does not make blisters on the littlest toe!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Mork

customer_reviews.title: So great that they go in water and are adjustable in ...
customer_reviews.text: I order a pair of these each year for my kids. So great that they go in water and are adjustable in multiple places.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Longo

customer_reviews.title: Good style and value.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these. We bought the same style last year and they hold up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Cecil

customer_reviews.title: which are really nice and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: No arch support in size 7.5. Returned and bought the adult ones instead, which are really nice and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Love the sandal
customer_reviews.text: Love the sandal. Well made and sturdy. Wish the straps were a little shorter, so they did not curl up and outward.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Run very small
customer_reviews.text: These do not follow traditional Teva sizing. My daughter has when Teva sandals for years and we have always been able to count on their size chart and measurements to get the perfect fit. I ordered her an 11 which not only should have fit, but should have given her tons of room to grow. Teva's generally run a little big on her. I was shocked when it was too small! I went to order a 12, but it is DOUBLE the cost of the size 11, which makes no sense. Don't buy from this seller - go somewhere else. And be aware that there run VERY small.
customer_reviews.author: Boothie

customer_reviews.title: recommend
customer_reviews.text: 3rd year buying. fit is great especially for narrow feet
customer_reviews.author: KUKUSHKA

customer_reviews.title: Great summer sandal
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of these sandals- we just keep going up in size for my daughter. Great summer sandal.
customer_reviews.author: kcurran

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We went to Six Flags did a lot of walking got wet on some rides. Not one complaint!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Fletes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved them. Kept feet more comfortable during hikes and kayaking.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tevas are great shoes. These are really nice for kids. Very nice color.
customer_reviews.author: Mel C

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandal and Amazon experience
customer_reviews.text: One day delivery was right on time. The fit was perfect and my granddaughter loved them. Since she will be hiking and getting them wet in tide pools etc. in Washington State-they will work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Avril

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is very picky about her shoes and is ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is very picky about her shoes and is always complaining about the fit. These are the only sandals she can wear all summer without complaining.
customer_reviews.author: AVP516

customer_reviews.title: great little sandal!
customer_reviews.text: you can always depend on teva for a comfortable fit!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Reno

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sandal! My little one loves them. They fit great and are great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: this one is from China and the original is from EEUU
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Enrique Gomez Peña

product_meta.title: Teva Tirra Sport Sandal (Toddler/Little Kid/Big Kid)
product_meta.description:
Strappy sandal

Teva is an authentic icon in the outdoor industry. Founded in the early 1980's by a Colorado River guide, Teva pioneered the sport-sandal category. For more than 20 years on rivers, in canyons, and across the trails of the great outdoors, athletes and enthusiasts have traveled the globe comfortably and confidently in Teva footwear. Providing positive contributions to the world in which we play is at the core of everything Teva stands for. The Teva name itself is a Hebrew word meaning "nature" and the hand logo is the Hopi symbol for "friendship" and "water." Teva supports the outdoor athletic lifestyle and remains committed to innovation in outdoor performance footwear, the platforms which carry enthusiasts beyond the offices of the day-to-day and onto the rivers, trails, and canyons of the next adventure.
